overview:
High-tech executive who’s spent the past half decade among: London, Stockholm, Silicon Valley and Brazil.

Past: Microsoft Mobile: Product Planning and Management for Windows Phone and online properties such as MSN Mobile.

Vodafone Group: Strategy and M&A executive for Vodafone Group HQ in London. Focus was non-voice initiatives such as disruptive services (consumer and backed), organisational restructurings and strategy implementation and M&A.

Tele2 Group: Global Head for Partnerships at Tele2 Group based out of Stockholm.

Currently: Director of Business Development and Venture for Samsung Mobile based in Silicon Valley.

relationships.title: Investor @Antengo / Global Partnerships Lead @Tele2 / Former M&A Executive @Vodafone
